features: 【HD Clear】Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max - 2021 6.7 inch smartphone. Tempered Glass with 9H screen hardness, Mothca matte screen protector is matte finish but also HD clear. While some poor quality matte glass has poor clarity and transparency, we promise you never need to worry about the same problem for Mothca Matte Glass.

【Smooth as Silk】The perfect matte surface has the silk-like touch feeling, magically resists dirt, sweat and annoying fingerprints, very little frictional resistance even for hand sweating. Easy to flick operation, "Comfortable Game Operation". 100% touch accurate.
【Anti-Glare】The matte finish tempered glass using the same technology as E-reader matte screen, no screen glare, even in bright sunlight, no dazzling, easy reading outdoor or under light.

【Go Further Than 2.5D Round Edge】A special polishing is crafted to edge of the glass to give a more smooth touch feeling, go further than 2.5D round edge, not easy to be broken and extremely durable. 9H hardness, protects your iPhone 13 Pro Max screen from scratches, daily wear and drops.

【Camera Lens Tempered Glass Screen Protector】Mothca camera lens screen protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max is made of HD clear 9H hardness tempered Glass, protects the raised camera cluster effectively and has no effect on the shot image quality. Packing list: 2 pieces of Mothca matte screen protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max, 2 pieces of camera lens tempered glass protector, 2 cleaning sets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2 Pack of Mothca Matte Screen Protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max 6.7-inch with Lens Protector CASE FRIENDLY: Mothca iPhone 13 Pro Max Matte screen protector will allow you to use almost all kinds of case. DAILY PROTECTION: Designed with a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating and an anti-scratch surface to protect your screen from accidental spills, oil residue from fingerprints, bumps and daily wear-and-tear. Package included: 2 x Matte Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max 6.7-inch2 x Camera Lens Tempered Glass Protector for iPhone 13 Pro Max 6.7-inch2 x Cleaning Set2 x Alignment Sticker1 x Retail Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has lasted over a month without a scratch!
reviews.reviewText: Easy install with all the tools. Still in perfect condition after a month. I run my phone without a case and this is all that’s protecting it. So far it’s doing great. It has withstood 2 drops from around 3-4 feet and did not leave a scratch. Matte finish is great. I’ve never had a screen protector last so long without a single mark. This brand has won me over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for everyone; but I love it.
reviews.reviewText: So first thing you should know, with basically ANTI matte/anti-glare coating, you'll get some "rainbowing" on brighter, mostly white, backgrounds. If you're someone who uses the lighter theme on your phone or like your apps with a white background, you might not enjoy this.But for us darkmode users, you'll hardly see it. It adds some rainbow sparkle to the white areas. It's noticeable, but I've been using matte screens since 2010 or so on my desktops. Recently I decided to give it a shot on my iPhone. If you aren't used to the effect, you might not like it at first. Understandably, but once you're used to it, it likely won't bother you much.Firstly, I find the the matte protector offers much less eye strain on pro-longed use. While my wife's phone has a regular glossy screen protector on her phone (we have the same model), I will admit her screen seems a hair sharper and more vivid. But I wouldn't say the screen protector makes ours look blurry or unsharp by any means. Perhaps if anything, the light diffusion and ever-so-slight softening of the screen has made me able to use my phone for longer periods of time with less eye-fatigue than prior.Second, you can use it in very challenging lighting conditions easily. Unlike a desktop or laptop where usually you're using them in more lighting controlled environments, we use our phones EVERYWHERE. At all times of days. This means you never know when the sun light, or lighting conditions, will make it nearly impossible to use your phone without a massive glare. I can have direct sunlight on my screen and not need the brightness very high to be able to comfortably use it now.Finger prints are less noticeable with the screen on, and wipe away easy. Usually just gently rubbing my phone screen along my sleeve cleans it up. I use my phone a lot, perhaps a "power user" as some say. And I've not seen any issues in a few months of the screen film wearing at all, and I don't particularly baby it either.Overall there are a few small trade-offs as any matte screen film has. But, if you're used to it or know what you're getting into, and you take the time to get used to it, you might appreciate how much easier it is on the eyes or how much more useable your phone becomes in all conditions. I've even had people say "oh wow, I like how your phone is matte!" many times. I would recommend to anyone who is used to matte screens and wants that experience on their phone.Lastly, installation is as easy as any phone screen. If you do your due-diligence prior to installing with a good cleaning and patience, you'll get a flawless installation. My first screen protector lasted me from November to February before I dropped it and got a crack in it. The crack is perhaps a little less noticeable in a matte screen protector than in a glossy screen protector. I was a big drop, from around 5 feet high. The actually phone was perfect so the protector does it's job. I didn't have to swap out the protector, as it only had one crack in it, but chose to since I had a second one anyways. I've had this second protector on for around a month and a half now, and it's held up flawless just like the first did until a very large drop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They DO stand behind it!!
reviews.reviewText: In the past, my experience with warranties/free replacement/etc has not been good. There is always a “catch” or some fine print that voids protection for the customer. My granddaughter dropped my phone on something, and of course, it landed face down, on a pebble, and the protector cracked. It DID save my phone from damage but I just figured I would have to buy a new one. While getting ready to submit my order, I read some of the other reviews on the page and people were having good things to say about replacement. Lond story short, I submitted my case and MOTHCA has agreed to replace not only my screen protector, but also my wife’s which cracked several months previous to mine! I’m quite surprised and also impressed! I will never buy screen protection from anyone else ~ iPhone or iPad! Thanks guys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I get these for EVERY phone I’ve had and I recommend them!
reviews.reviewText: Best for matte protection! Smooth easy to use. Easy to install. I’ve recommended these to everyone I know and I’ve also bought a few for some people I know that’s why I have this on my list to review so many times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This protector works extremely well with my iPhone. The protector is very responsive and works as good if not better than Apple's original glass. It does a decent job minimizing fingerprint smudges but it doesn't eliminate them. It's easy to install, stays in place, and prevents glare at any angle. I'm happy with my purchase so far and feel like it will hold up over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these! High quality and super smooth but not glossy. Reduces glare, better feel, less fingerprints. Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well
reviews.reviewText: Love the feel and look on my ph. No bubbles. I highly recommend. 13 pro max

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Matte Screen protector but chips easy
reviews.reviewText: This is the third set ive ordered, they chip and crack supe easy but i love the brand, customer service and the Matte so ill just stick with them.

Love love love. The matte feeling is my fav, comes with a guidance to apply the glass itsself, also comes with sticky pads to remove any dust before application and an alcohol swab. I put it on successfully without any air bubbles and i love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ben tevreden met screenprotector, beter dan ik had verwacht. Geen vingerafdruk meer, en voelt als originele scherm. Aanrader!!

Bisher hatte ich immer klarglas-Optik, aber mir ist aufgefallen, dass ich länger lesen kann, wenn die Oberfläche entspiegelt ist. Mit dieser matten Oberfläche lässt sich nicht nur leichter lesen, der touchscreen ist iwie auch angenehmer und Fingerabdrücke gibt es auch nicht mehr. Anbringung ist super easy und auch nach dem ersten Runterfallen sitzt sie noch perfekt und schadfrei. Der montagerahmen ist auch sehr praktisch. Danke dafür
Ik heb het product niet gehad. Zogezegd geleverd in de brievenbus terwijl het er niet eens in past!!
Adapté et magnifique protection mat éprouvée pls fois
